title: JavaScript Level 8 â€” Strings & String Methods
intro: This level covers string manipulation and common string methods.
points: Understand that strings are sequences of characters.
Access characters in a string using indexing (str[0], str[1], ...).
Use length property to get the size of a string.
Use methods like toUpperCase(), toLowerCase(), trim(), and slice().
Solve simple problems like counting characters or formatting text.
